com.example.schultzhattervigweatherviewer

Class FragmentForecast

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.example.schultzhattervigweatherviewer.FragmentForecast
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IListeners

    public class FragmentForecast
extends Fragment
implements IListeners

    Description:

    FragmentForecast is the fragment that displays all of the information on screen after the API call has been made and returns values. If API call fails this fragment sends a toast message indicating that there was a connection problem.

    Date:
            Novemeber 13, 2012

    Extends:
            Fragment

    Implements:
            IListeners

    Author:
    Josh Schultz, Erik Hattervig

      • onLocationLoaded

        public void onLocationLoaded(ForecastLocation forecastLocation)

        Description:

        Handles updating the display. Shows toast if the forecastLocation is null, otherwise it updates _currentLocation and updates the display.

        Date:
                Novemeber 13, 2012

        Specified by:
        onLocationLoaded in interface IListeners
        Parameters:
        forecastLocation - - The ForecastLocation being updated

      • onForecastLoaded

        public void onForecastLoaded(Forecast forecast)

        Description:

        Handles updating the display. Shows toast if the forecastLocation is null, otherwise it updates _currentLocation and updates the display.

        Date:
                Novemeber 13, 2012

        Specified by:
        onForecastLoaded in interface IListeners
        Parameters:
        forecast - - The Forecast being updated

      • refreshForecast

        private void refreshForecast()

        Description:

        Refreshes the Forecast. Calls an async task to receive the current forecast from the web API call. If the network is not available, this function displays toast.

        Date:
                Novemeber 13, 2012

      • updateDisplay

        private void updateDisplay(boolean receivedForecast)

        Description:

        This function updates the display if a forecast has been received. If a forcast has not been received then the display is set to display the unavailable_message string.

        Date:
                Novemeber 13, 2012

        Parameters:
        receivedForecast - - a boolean indicating whether a forecast has been receved or not.

      • isNetworkAvailable

        private boolean isNetworkAvailable()

        Description:

        This function tests to see if there is a network available using a ConnectivityManager

        Date:
                Novemeber 13, 2012

        Returns:
        true - the network is available
        false - the network is not available
